simulator

Interface PathFullInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CexPathAsBDDs, CexPathStates, PathFull

    public interface PathFullInfo
    Interface for classes that provide (read) access to a path through a model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getChoice(int step)
      Get the index of the choice taken for a given step.
      double getCumulativeReward(int step, int rsi)
      Get the total (state and transition) reward accumulated up until entering a given step of the path.
      double getCumulativeTime(int step)
      Get the total time spent up until entering a given step of the path.
      java.lang.String getModuleOrAction(int step)
      Get a string describing the action/module of a given step.
      int getModuleOrActionIndex(int step)
      Get the index i of the action taken for a given step.
      State getState(int step)
      Get the state at a given step of the path.
      double getStateReward(int step, int rsi)
      Get a state reward for the state at a given step of the path.
      double getTime(int step)
      Get the time spent in a state at a given step of the path.
      double getTransitionReward(int step, int rsi)
      Get a transition reward associated with a given step.
      boolean hasActionInfo()
      Does this object store information about rewards?
      boolean hasChoiceInfo()
      Does this object store information about which choices were taken?
      boolean hasLoopInfo()
      Does this object store information about loops in the path?
      boolean hasRewardInfo()
      Does this object store information about rewards?
      boolean hasTimeInfo()
      Does this object store information about time elapse (for continuous-time models)?
      boolean isLooping()
      Does the path contain a deterministic loop? If no loop info is stored (hasLoopInfo() is false), returns false.
      long loopEnd()
      What is the step index of the end of the deterministic loop, if it exists? If no loop info is stored (hasLoopInfo() is false), returns 0.
      long loopStart()
      What is the step index of the start of the deterministic loop, if it exists? If no loop info is stored (hasLoopInfo() is false), returns 0.
      long size()
      Get the size of the path (number of steps; or number of states - 1).

    • Method Detail

      • size

        long size()
        Get the size of the path (number of steps; or number of states - 1).

      • getState

        State getState(int step)
        Get the state at a given step of the path.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)

      • getStateReward

        double getStateReward(int step,
                      int rsi)
        Get a state reward for the state at a given step of the path. If no reward info is stored (hasRewardInfo() is false), returns 0.0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • getCumulativeTime

        double getCumulativeTime(int step)
        Get the total time spent up until entering a given step of the path. If no time info is stored (hasTimeInfo() is false), returns 0.0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)

      • getCumulativeReward

        double getCumulativeReward(int step,
                           int rsi)
        Get the total (state and transition) reward accumulated up until entering a given step of the path. If no reward info is stored (hasRewardInfo() is false), returns 0.0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • getTime

        double getTime(int step)
        Get the time spent in a state at a given step of the path. If no time info is stored (hasTimeInfo() is false), returns 0.0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)

      • getChoice

        int getChoice(int step)
        Get the index of the choice taken for a given step. If no choice info is stored (hasChoiceInfo() is false), returns 0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)

      • getModuleOrActionIndex

        int getModuleOrActionIndex(int step)
        Get the index i of the action taken for a given step. If i>0, then i-1 is the index of an action label (0-indexed) If i<0, then -i-1 is the index of a module (0-indexed) If no action info is stored (hasActionInfo() is false), returns 0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)

      • getModuleOrAction

        java.lang.String getModuleOrAction(int step)
        Get a string describing the action/module of a given step. If no action info is stored (hasActionInfo() is false), returns "".
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)

      • getTransitionReward

        double getTransitionReward(int step,
                           int rsi)
        Get a transition reward associated with a given step. If no reward info is stored (hasRewardInfo() is false), returns 0.0.
        Parameters:
        step - Step index (0 = initial state/step of path)
        rsi - Reward structure index

      • isLooping

        boolean isLooping()
        Does the path contain a deterministic loop? If no loop info is stored (hasLoopInfo() is false), returns false.

      • loopStart

        long loopStart()
        What is the step index of the start of the deterministic loop, if it exists? If no loop info is stored (hasLoopInfo() is false), returns 0.

      • loopEnd

        long loopEnd()
        What is the step index of the end of the deterministic loop, if it exists? If no loop info is stored (hasLoopInfo() is false), returns 0.

      • hasRewardInfo

        boolean hasRewardInfo()
        Does this object store information about rewards?

      • hasChoiceInfo

        boolean hasChoiceInfo()
        Does this object store information about which choices were taken?

      • hasActionInfo

        boolean hasActionInfo()
        Does this object store information about rewards?

      • hasTimeInfo

        boolean hasTimeInfo()
        Does this object store information about time elapse (for continuous-time models)?

      • hasLoopInfo

        boolean hasLoopInfo()
        Does this object store information about loops in the path?
